Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-29941 affecting package llvm16 for versions less than 16.0.0-4
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-29941 affecting package llvm16 for versions less than 16.0.0-4. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package llvm16 is earlier than 16.0.0-4, affected by CVE-2023-29941
